    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public Long getId()
        Overrides:
        getId in class ShopifyObject
        Returns:
        The unique identifier of this gift card.

      • getCode

        public String getCode()
        Returns:
        The gift card code. This is only used when applying a gift card and is not visible on a Checkout object synced with Shopify.

      • getLastCharacters

        public String getLastCharacters()
        Returns:
        The last characters of the applied gift card code.

      • getBalance

        public String getBalance()
        Returns:
        The amount left on this gift card.

      • getAmountUsed

        public String getAmountUsed()
        Returns:
        The amount already spent from this gift card.

      • getCheckout

        public Checkout getCheckout()
        For internal use only.
        Returns:
        The Checkout associated with this gift card.
